name: hbim
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

comment: If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph -> ps ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-1993.) (Proof shortened by Mel L. O'Cat, 3-Mar-2008.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 1-Jan-2018.)
